verbs.description: [ARG0: slow - motion landslide] [V: takes] [ARG1: adirondack dreams] [ARGM-TMP: when the low rumble of his refrigerator ice maker in the night snaps him out of fitful sleep] jim marlatt initially fears he and charity his wife of 40 years have lost the race to save their home a slow - moving landslide that has 82 acres of forest boulders and earth coming down the slope of porter mountain in the adirondacks has spared the marlatts dream home for now two massive steel i - beams slipped in wednesday atop the foundation are safeguarding the house as the couple new york central mutual jim marlatt macholds porter mountain pam machold keene new york marlatts andrew kozlowski landslide charity
